response.job_title: Mechanical Engineer / Project Manager / R&D Engineer
response.summary:
Mechanical engineer, specializing in project management and leadership, with over four years of experience in mechanical design, industrial machinery, industrial maintenance, and production as a manufacturing supervisor. Proficient in software such as Inventor, Solid Edge, and SolidWorks.
Highly interested in working in project planning and management, product design, and industrial maintenance management.
Proficient in English with a B2 level, able to work in a team environment, possess leadership skills, innovative, and with a critical thinking mindset.




Engineering skills:

• CAD modeling (Inventor, Autocad and solid Works)
• Advanced management of the office package (Excel, Word, Power point)
• Survey of dimensional and manufacturing drawings of mechanical components for manufacturing purposes.
• Design of air conditioning, ventilation and industrial refrigeration systems.
• Design of mechanical components and industrial machinery.
• Planning of preventive, predictive and corrective maintenance of machinery used in industrial processes.
• Supervision and control of technical personnel in production plants.
response.skills: Leadership of multidisciplinary teams, innovation management, Robotic design, Gestión de la innovación, Liderazgo de equipos multidisciplinarios, Ingeniería, Engineering Management, Diseño asistido por ordenador (CAD), Resolución de problemas, Capacidad de análisis, Ingeniería mecánica, Liderazgo de equipos, Administración de la producción, Trabajo en equipo, Gestión de proyectos, Liderazgo

profile_positions.description:
•	Coordination of technological development and innovation activities
•	Generation of mechanical structures and systems for remote-operated equipment for various purposes
•	Planning of production and manufacturing activities of mechanical components for robotic systems
•	Technical project management, achieving technological development objectives
profile_positions.title: Robotic and project engineer

profile_positions.description: I worked as an aeronautical structural testing specialist, which included the development of machinery and equipment necessary to perform technical conformity tests for aeronautical and industrial products.
profile_positions.title: Aeronautical structural testing specialist

profile_positions.description: I worked as an engineering consultant for aeronautical systems in the engineering section of the Aerospace Industry Group of the Colombian Air Force Maintenance Command (FAC). My duties ranged from engineering development and design for the manufacturing of aeronautical products necessary for the maintenance of the FAC fleet, to the development and design of tools and testing benches for the various needs of the FAC.
profile_positions.title: Engineering consultant in aeronautical systems design

profile_positions.description: Execution of technical personnel control tasks, industrial machinery design, and manufacturing supervision
profile_positions.title: Chief plant engineer

profile_positions.description: I worked as a ramp inspector for the technical-mechanical inspection processes of vehicles according to Colombian standards for road safety.
profile_positions.title: Ramp Inspector

profile_positions.description: Degree project in internship modality, whose general objective is to carry out the first stage in the process of implementing the ISO 50001 energy management system. This stage consists of designing, planning, and carrying out the entire energy diagnosis process of the CAMAN aerospace industrial complex.
profile_positions.title: University Intern

profile_positions.description: I participated as a junior engineer and young researcher in an applied research project called "Design and construction of a test bench for certification tests of propulsion systems for remotely piloted aircraft," directed by the Aeronautical Certification Section of Defense SECAD, of the Colombian Air Force. During this time, I carried out tasks related to project management, design of mechanical components, and development of operation manuals for machinery
profile_positions.title: Junior engineer and young researcher

company.name: SUNNY APP ROBOTICS
company.description: We create robots that contribute to the operation and maintenance of large-scale solar photovoltaic systems. 🇨🇴
